title: App Development Practical Skill Enhancement: Project-Based Education Design for Medical Procedure Execution

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Perform standard medical procedures (basic vital sign measurement, disinfection protocols, wound care) with ≥80% accuracy.

Within one week, learners can analyze two patient cases in teams of 3-4 using medical simulation tools (e.g., Simul8, AnyLogic), complete one simulation model, and submit a final report incorporating at least three peer evaluations and instructor feedbacks
Demonstrate practical competency in adhering to medical ethics and safety protocols (average ≥75/100 across three formative assessments).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
